questions.text: Do you ensure that data you hold of your clients are accurate and up to date?
options: Yes, we allow clients to contact us if their details have changed
Yes, we frequently contact our clients to ensure their details are up to date
No, we do not check if our clients data is up to date

questions.text: Do your company keep data longer than is necessary?
options: Yes, we keep hold of it in case we need it
No, we delete it when it is not needed anymore

questions.text: Do your company allow clients rights to access a copy of the personal data you hold on them?
options: Yes, we have a simple process for clients to obtain a copy of their personal data
No, we do not allow clients to obtain a copy of their personal data

questions.text:
If your business processes sensitive data (such as ethnicity or health data);
 how often do you carry out Data Protection Impact Assessments (DPIAs)?
options: We do not carry out data protection impact assessments
We do not process sensitive data

questions.text: Do you ensure that clients give detailed consent prior to data collection/processing
options: Yes, we ensure clients give detailed consent prior to data collection
We ensure clients give consent prior to data collection but consent is not detailed
No, we do not ask for consent prior to data collection

questions.text: Do you delete client data that is innacurate and outdated?
options: Yes, we delete outdated or inaccurate data
Yes, but only after they ask us
No, we keep it for our records

questions.text: Do you use encryption and access control technologies when processing client data?
options: Yes, we use both encryption and access control technologies when processing client data
We use encryption but not access control when processing client data
We use access control but not encryption when processing client data
No, we do not use encryption or access control when processing client data

questions.text: Do your company ensure that client data collected is specific, explicit and legitimate for what its needed for?
Under your company procedure, how quick does your company notify the ICO if in the event of a data breach?
options: We do not contact the ICO in the event of a data breach

questions.text: Under your company procedure, how often is client data backed up?
options: We do not backup our data

questions.text: Does your company store client passwords/bank details using encryption?
Under your company procedure, how often are administrator passwords reset?

Do your accountants that handle client data recieve GDPR/Data protection training?
If so, how often do they receive said training?

If your company receives or tranfers data outside the UK or EEA,
do you ensure that the destination country has an adequate amount of data security?
options: We do not transfer data outside of the UK/EEA

questions.text: When clients make a right to erasure request, how long does it take for your company to delete client data?
options: We do not monitor right to erasure requests

questions.text:
Do you uphold clients right to object to their personal data being processed
 if it is being used for marketing purposes?
options: Yes, allow clients the right to object
We do not use data for marketing purposes

questions.text:
Before collecting client data, do you inform the client of all of their detailed rights under the UK GDPR?
such as the right to erasure, right to object, right to be informed, etc.
options: Yes, we inform clients of all of their rights before data collection
Yes, we inform clients of all of their rights prior to data collection, but not detailed
We inform clients of some of their rights prior to data collection
No, we do not inform clients of their rights prior to data collection

questions.text: In the event of a data breach, does your company have a written procedure for system recovery and mitigation?
Does your company carry out regular audits to ensure that you are compliant with the UK GDPR?
Does your company have a procedure in place for notifying clients in an event of a data breach?
options: Yes, we notify clients within a given timeframe
